page.title: 18Recreation and Leisure
page.content: We carried out a survey of leisure activities and of the people we asked 61 people enjoyed {GARDENING.}The next most popular activity was{WATCHING {TELEVISION.}27 people like {D.I.Y. {JOBS }about the house and 21 people most enjoy{READING.}The next most popular pastime is{KNITTING }which is practised by 17 people.15 people like {WATCHING SPORT}and 13 people {GO {SWIMMING}regularly at Carne Brea leisure centre while 9 others play some {SPORT.}7 people enjoy {WALKING } and 5 people have various hobbies including {DRAWING,PAINTING,SEWING {FISHING }and {HELPING IN THE CHURCH. Other hobbies mentioned by one or two people were conservation,making Teddy Bears,horse riding,tennis,sun- bathing,shooting,Yoga,collecting thimbles,keeping chickens,photography, disco-dancing,clogging and crosswords.
